Package com.FoodDeliveryManagementSystem.BusinessLogic

Interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing

All Known Implementing Classes:
DeliveryService
public interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing
The IDeliveryServiceProcessing interface defines the main methods a delivery service should implement, as well as the pre and post conditions these methods must meet in order to be deemed well formed.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void AddOrder​(Order order, java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> cartItems)
    Adds a new entry inside the order map.
    void AddProduct​(MenuItem e)
    Adds the specified product to the set of products.
    void AddUser​(User e)
    Adds the specified user to the collection of users
    java.util.HashSet<MenuItem> getProducts()
    Returns all the available products on the instance.
    java.util.ArrayList<User> getUsers()
    Returns the list of registered users.
    void RemoveProduct​(MenuItem item)
    Removes the specified product from the set of products.
    java.util.List<User> reportNumberOfClients​(int times, int value)
    Returns the users who have ordered more times than the number specified and their order was greater in value than the value specified
    java.util.List<MenuItem> reportNumberOfTimes​(int times)
    Returns the menu items ordered more than the specified number of times
    java.util.List<Order> reportOrderTimeInterval​(int from, int to)
    Returns a list of all the orders ordered between the hourly interval from and to
    java.util.List<Tuple<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Long>> reportProductsInADay​(java.time.LocalDate time)
    Returns a tuple of the title of products ordered in a date, together with the amount they were orderd
    void setProducts​(java.util.Collection<? extends MenuItem> products)
    Sets the products to the specified collection.

  • Method Details

    • getProducts

      java.util.HashSet<MenuItem> getProducts()
      Returns all the available products on the instance.
      Returns:
      the available products.

    • setProducts

      void setProducts​(java.util.Collection<? extends MenuItem> products)
      Sets the products to the specified collection.
      Parameters:
      products - a collection of menu items.
      precondition
      products != null && products.size() > 0

    • AddProduct

      void AddProduct​(MenuItem e)
      Adds the specified product to the set of products.
      Parameters:
      e - the product to be inserted
      precondition
      e != null
      postcondition
      getProducts().contains(e)

    • RemoveProduct

      void RemoveProduct​(MenuItem item)
      Removes the specified product from the set of products.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to be removed
      precondition
      item != null
      postcondition
      getProducts().noneMatch(item::equals)

    • getUsers

      java.util.ArrayList<User> getUsers()
      Returns the list of registered users.
      Returns:
      the list of registered users

    • AddUser

      void AddUser​(User e)
      Adds the specified user to the collection of users
      Parameters:
      e - the user to be added.
      precondition
      e != null
      postcondition
      getUser().contains(e)

    • AddOrder

      void AddOrder​(Order order, java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> cartItems)
      Adds a new entry inside the order map.
      Parameters:
      order - the order to be added.
      cartItems - the associated items, ordered
      precondition
      order.getTotal() == cartItems.stream().mapToInt(MenuItem::getPrice).sum()

    • reportOrderTimeInterval

      java.util.List<Order> reportOrderTimeInterval​(int from, int to)
      Returns a list of all the orders ordered between the hourly interval from and to
      Parameters:
      from - the lower bound of the hourly interval
      to - the upper bound of the hourly interval
      Returns:
      the list
      precondition
      from >= 0 && to <= 24

    • reportNumberOfTimes

      java.util.List<MenuItem> reportNumberOfTimes​(int times)
      Returns the menu items ordered more than the specified number of times
      Parameters:
      times - the number of times the items were ordered.
      Returns:
      the list of menu items.
      precondition
      times > 0
      postcondition

    • reportNumberOfClients

      java.util.List<User> reportNumberOfClients​(int times, int value)
      Returns the users who have ordered more times than the number specified and their order was greater in value than the value specified
      Parameters:
      times - the total times the user ordered.
      value - the minimal value of the order
      Returns:
      the list of users
      precondition
      times >= 0 && value > 0

    • reportProductsInADay

      java.util.List<Tuple<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Long>> reportProductsInADay​(java.time.LocalDate time)
      Returns a tuple of the title of products ordered in a date, together with the amount they were orderd
      Parameters:
      time - the date on which the products were ordered
      Returns:
      a list of tuples containing a title, amount ordered.
      precondition
      time != null
